verses.verse: Now Boaz <S%H1162><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up <S%H5927><s%> to the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and sat down <S%H3427><s%> there. <S%H1350><s%> Behold, the near kinsman of whom Boaz <S%H1162><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> came <S%H5674><s%> by; <S%H6423><s%> to whom he said, <S%H1696><s%> "Come <S%H5674><s%> over here, <S%H5493><s%> friend, <S%H1945><s%> and sit down! <S%H3427><s%>" He turned aside, <S%H5493><s%> and sat down. <S%H3427><s%>
He took <S%H3947><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Sit down <S%H3427><s%> here. <S%H3427><s%>" They sat down.

He said <S%H559><s%> to the near kinsman, <S%H1350><s%> "Naomi, <S%H5281><s%> who has come back <S%H7725><s%> out of the country <S%H7704><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> is selling <S%H4376><s%> the parcel <S%H2513><s%> of land, <S%H7704><s%> which was our brother <S%H251><s%> Elimelech <S%H458><s%>'s.

I thought <S%H559><s%> to disclose <S%H1540><s%> it to you, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H7069><s%> 'Buy it before those <S%H3427><s%> who sit here, <S%H2205><s%> and before the elders of my people. <S%H5971><s%>' If you will redeem <S%H1350><s%> it, <S%H1350><s%> redeem it; <S%H1350><s%> but if you will not redeem it, <S%H5046><s%> then tell me, <S%H3045><s%> that I may know. For there is no one to redeem <S%H1350><s%> it besides <S%H2108><s%> you; <S%H310><s%> and I am after you. <S%H559><s%>" He said, "I will redeem it. <S%H1350><s%>"

Then Boaz <S%H1162><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "On the day <S%H3117><s%> you buy <S%H7069><s%> the field <S%H7704><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Naomi, <S%H5281><s%> you must buy <S%H7069><s%> it also from the <S%H7327><s%> Moabitess, <S%H4125><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of the dead, <S%H4191><s%> to raise up <S%H6965><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the dead <S%H4191><s%> on his inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>"

The near kinsman <S%H1350><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "I can't <S%H3201><s%> redeem <S%H1350><s%> it for myself, <S%H7843><s%> lest I mar my own inheritance. <S%H5159><s%> Take <S%H1350><s%> my right <S%H1353><s%> of redemption for yourself; <S%H3201><s%> for I can't redeem it. <S%H1350><s%>"

Now this was the custom in former time <S%H6440><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> concerning redeeming <S%H1353><s%> and concerning exchanging, <S%H8545><s%> to confirm <S%H6965><s%> all things: <S%H1697><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> took off <S%H8025><s%> his shoe, <S%H5275><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> it to his neighbor; <S%H7453><s%> and this was the way of attestation <S%H8584><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
So the near kinsman <S%H1350><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Boaz, <S%H1162><s%> "Buy <S%H7069><s%> it for yourself. <S%H8025><s%>" He took off his shoe. <S%H5275><s%>

Boaz <S%H1162><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the elders, <S%H2205><s%> and to all the people, <S%H5971><s%> "You are witnesses <S%H5707><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> that I have bought <S%H7069><s%> all that was Elimelech <S%H458><s%>'s, and all that was Chilion <S%H3630><s%>'s and Mahlon <S%H4248><s%>'s, from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Naomi. <S%H5281><s%>

Moreover the <S%H7327><s%> Moabitess, <S%H4125><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Mahlon, <S%H4248><s%> I have purchased <S%H7069><s%> to be my wife, <S%H802><s%> to raise up <S%H6965><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the dead <S%H4191><s%> on his inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> that the name <S%H8034><s%> of the dead <S%H4191><s%> not be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H5973><s%> his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and from the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his place. <S%H4725><s%> You are witnesses <S%H5707><s%> this day. <S%H3117><s%>"

All the people <S%H5971><s%> who were in the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and the elders, <S%H2205><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "We are witnesses. <S%H5707><s%> May Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> make <S%H5414><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> who has come <S%H935><s%> into your house <S%H1004><s%> like Rachel <S%H7354><s%> and like Leah, <S%H3812><s%> which two <S%H8147><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and treat <S%H6213><s%> you worthily <S%H2428><s%> in Ephrathah, <S%H672><s%> and be famous <S%H7121><s%> in Bethlehem. <S%H1035><s%>

Let your house <S%H1004><s%> be like the house <S%H1004><s%> of Perez, <S%H6557><s%> whom Tamar <S%H8559><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> to Judah, <S%H3063><s%> of the seed <S%H2233><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> you of this young woman. <S%H5291><s%>"

So Boaz <S%H1162><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Ruth, <S%H7327><s%> and she became his wife; <S%H802><s%> and he went in <S%H935><s%> to her, <S%H3068><s%> and Yahweh gave <S%H5414><s%> her conception, <S%H2032><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> a son. <S%H1121><s%>

The women <S%H802><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Naomi, <S%H5281><s%> "Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who has not left <S%H7673><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> without a near kinsman; <S%H1350><s%> and let his name <S%H8034><s%> be famous <S%H7121><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

He shall be to you a restorer <S%H7725><s%> of life, <S%H5315><s%> and sustain <S%H3557><s%> you in your old age, <S%H7872><s%> for your daughter-in <S%H3618><s%>-law, who loves <S%H157><s%> you, <S%H2896><s%> who is better to you than seven <S%H7651><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> has borne him. <S%H3205><s%>"
Naomi <S%H5281><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the child, <S%H3206><s%> and laid <S%H7896><s%> it in her bosom, <S%H2436><s%> and became nurse to it. <S%H539><s%>

The women, <S%H7934><s%> her neighbors, gave <S%H7121><s%> him a name, <S%H8034><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "There is a son <S%H1121><s%> born <S%H3205><s%> to Naomi; <S%H5281><s%>" and they named <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H8034><s%> Obed. <S%H5744><s%> He is the father <S%H1><s%> of Jesse, <S%H3448><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%>
Now this is the history of the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Perez: <S%H6557><s%> Perez <S%H6557><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Hezron, <S%H2696><s%>
and Hezron <S%H2696><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Ram, <S%H7410><s%> and Ram <S%H7410><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Amminadab, <S%H5992><s%>
and Amminadab <S%H5992><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Nahshon, <S%H5177><s%> and Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Salmon, <S%H8009><s%>
and Salmon <S%H8012><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Boaz, <S%H1162><s%> and Boaz <S%H1162><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Obed, <S%H5744><s%>
and Obed <S%H5744><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jesse, <S%H3448><s%> and Jesse <S%H3448><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%>
